# Playlist

**Instance Method**

Creates a new playlist object.

## Declaration

```swift
new Playlist();
```

## Return Value

An empty playlist array.

## Discussion

After creating a new playlist, use the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/tvmljs/playlist/1627433-push] method to add new media items to the end of the playlist.

## Modifying the Playlist

- **item**: Returns the media item located in the indicated array index.
- **length**: The number of items in the playlist.
- **pop**: Removes a media item from the end of a playlist.
- **push**: Adds a media item to the end of a playlist.
- **splice**: Deletes the indicated array elements and replaces them with the specified elements.

items.description: Returns the media item located in the indicated array index.
